subdefinitions.definition: Describing kinds of birds that normally cannot fly, such as the penguin , ostrich , and emu .
examples: The indigenous fauna of Australia and New Zealand featured an especially interesting array of flightless birds.

subdefinitions.definition: Describing an individual bird that normally would be able to fly but in this case cannot, such as an injured sparrow.
examples: The animal shelter has a flightless sparrow named Shiny, who seems to make up for his disability by being an avid runner.

subdefinitions.definition: Suddenly deprived of a scheduled (airline) flight by its cancellation .
examples: Oh great, some wind is blowing in Chicago, so now I'm flightless in Seattle, because this airline can't cope!
